sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' const Weathercard = ({ tempInfo }) => { const { temp, humidity, pressure, weathermood, name, speed, country, sunset } = tempInfo; // converting the seconds into time for sunset let sec = sunset; let date = new Date(sec*1000); let timeStr = `${date.getHours()}: ${date.getMinutes()} }`; return ( <>
{ temp }°
sunny
{name}, {country}
{ new Date().toLocaleString() }
{/* our 4column section */}

{sunset} PM
Sunset

{humidity}
Humidity

{pressure}
Pressure

{speed}
Speed

) } export default Weathercard;
